function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","Impact":"Increased risk of spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and lack of space for distancing.","Mitigation":"Promote policies for affordable housing and urban planning that address overcrowding and provide adequate living space.","Technologies":"Urban planning and zoning regulations, affordable housing initiatives.","People":"Low-income individuals and families, densely populated urban areas.","Owner":"Government, urban planners, housing authorities."},{"Description":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","Impact":"Altered perception of natural sounds and increased awareness of existing urban wildlife.","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction strategies and urban green spaces to promote natural sounds and wildlife appreciation.","Technologies":"Noise barriers, soundproofing, urban green spaces.","People":"Urban residents, environmental advocates.","Owner":"Local government, city planning authorities, environmental organizations."}]}
